extends Object

      Used only in passed element actions.
      static void captureScreenShot(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, String appendedText, boolean passFailStatus)
      Used in all browser actions, in failed element actions, in passed element actions where the element can no longer be found, and in passed switchToDefaultContent element action which requires no locator.

    • Method Detail

      • captureScreenShot

        public static void captureScreenShot(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                     boolean passFailStatus)
        Used only on browser-based custom validation points. passFailStatus; true means pass and false means fail.
        Parameters:
        driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
        passFailStatus - A flag to determine whether the action has passed or failed

      • captureScreenShot

        public static void captureScreenShot(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                     org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator,
                                     boolean passFailStatus)
        Used only on assertElementExists and verifyElementExists element-based custom validation points. passFailStatus; true means pass and false means fail.
        Parameters:
        driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
        elementLocator - the locator of the webElement under test (By xpath, id, selector, name ...etc)
        passFailStatus - A flag to determine whether the action has passed or failed

      • captureScreenShot

        public static void captureScreenShot(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                     String appendedText,
                                     boolean passFailStatus)
        Used in all browser actions, in failed element actions, in passed element actions where the element can no longer be found, and in passed switchToDefaultContent element action which requires no locator. passFailStatus; true means pass and false means fail.
        Parameters:
        driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
        appendedText - the text that needs to be appended to the name of the screenshot to make it more recognizable
        passFailStatus - A flag to determine whether the action has passed or failed

      • captureScreenShot

        public static void captureScreenShot(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                     org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator,
                                     String appendedText,
                                     boolean passFailStatus)
        Used only in passed element actions. Appended Text is added to the screenshot name to signal why it was taken.
        Parameters:
        driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
        elementLocator - the locator of the webElement under test (By xpath, id, selector, name ...etc)
        appendedText - the text that needs to be appended to the name of the screenshot to make it more recognizable
